entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:52 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:52 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:52 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
